data.title: WFC Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: The Winnipeg Football Club Hall of Fame was initiated in 1984 to recognize the contributions of the many players, coaches, executives and volunteers who have contributed to the success of the organization over the years. Inductees are selected by a committee comprised of former players and executives and are honoured each year at the football […]
data.text:
The Winnipeg Football Club Hall of Fame was initiated in 1984 to recognize the contributions of the many players, coaches, executives and volunteers who have contributed to the success of the organization over the years. Inductees are selected by a committee comprised of former players and executives and are honoured each year at the football club’s Legacy Dinner.
